maqras.text: D Neppa i Issemfaoaqen sin ilellen, yiwen elaw, d aeidan, wayev oeag, d ameo$an. Irra, garasen, agadir, aedid ur nepwazgar
D Neppa i Ixelqen amdan seg waman. Ifka yas laamum, lexwal. Mass ik Izga d Win Izemren
La aabden, war Oebbi, ayen ur ten inefaan, ur ten ivuooen. Ajehli, ar loiha n Mass is, izga d win issefoa$en
Nuzen ik id kan, i ubecceo d uneddeo
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$, $ef waya, kra n teqdiat. Ssutre$ kan, i win ib$an, ad ia$ abrid $eo Mass is
Ppkel $ef Umuddir ur Nepmeppat. Sbuccaa iT s ccekoan. Iqadd i tussna ibekkaven n imdanen iS
I Ixelqen tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di sdis wussan. Sinna, Aenin Iaannec af usgeld. Steqsi w iT issnen
Ma pwanecden: "knut i Uenin"! A d rren: "d acu T Uenin? Day a neknu i w ara $ d tamoev"? D a$unfu i sen irna
Ad Ioqu Win Irran itran deg igenni. Irna degs, lefnao, akked waggur bu tziri
D Neppa i Irran iv akked wass mestebaan, i win ib$an ad ismekti, ne$ ib$an ad isnemmer
Ixdimen n Uenin, i ileeeun di tmurt di lehna, ma numren ten at war tussna, qqaoen: "tifrat
I ippaawazen i Mass nnsen, knan ne$ bedden
I iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Veooef segne$ aaaqeb n Loahennama. Ih, aaaqeb is ipwaeeppem
Neppat, s tidep, d tadirant, i tnezdu$t akked i$imi
Wid, ma seoofen, ur veggiaen, ur pcueeun: igi iwulmen atan garasen
Wid ur nenaao oebbi nniven, ar tama n Oebbi. Ur neqqen amdan, d ayen Igdel Oebbi, siwa $ef tidep. Ur zennun. Win ixedmen ayagi, ibbwi ibekkaven
Ad ippuaaqeb berdayen, ass n tnekra. Ad iwekkeo d imdelli
siwa win isteooaen, iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. I wigi, ad Inuef Oebbi tucmitin nnsen, s yise$iyen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Win isteooaen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ihi, iutub Oebbi s ppuba n tidep
Wid ur ncehhed ccada n rrya; u, ma mmugren tifukal, ddan d ukyisen
Wid, mara asen d smmektin issekniyen n Mass nnsen, ur d neggar tiaeegt ne$ tider$elt fellasen
Wid iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Err tilawin nne$, akked dderya nne$, d ssuaada n wallen. Err ane$ d wid inehhun wid ipeezziben
Widak ad ppuoazin s t$uofatin, ilmend n wayen ueboen. Ad magren, dinna, azul, tifrat
Dinna, ad wekkoen, d amkan amxalef i tnezdu$t d i$imi
Ini: "ur d Irezzu Mass iw, degwen, ma ur tnujem $uoeS. Ni$ tnekoem? Ad iu$al waya d ayen ilezmen
